name: Diesel Mountain Racing Pro
description:
Diesel Mountain Racing Pro is an addicting physics based uphill driving game for diesel trucks. Challenge yourself climbing up the mountain hills in the snow, dirt, grass and rocky terrains while performing tricks like flips to gain bonuses.

Compare your skills to your competition with our online community of leader-boards, achievements, and daily challenges.

So, what are you waiting for? Start that diesel engine, accelerate and go full throttle up that hill in Diesel Mountain Racing Pro. The ultimate diesel truck hill climbing racing game experience.
If you run into any bugs, let us know via email at support@slyonstudios.com, and please leave us feedback. We update often to with suggestions from the community, bug fixes and new features.
